info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:00PM EDT until June 22 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL COLUMBIANA AND BEAVER COUNTIES... At 359 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ohioville, or 8 miles northeast of East Liverpool, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Aliquippa, Beaver Falls, Monaca, Economy, Ambridge, New Brighton, Beaver, Calcutta, Baden, Rochester, Ohioville, and Harmony Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
